description: The Microsoft Band SDK gives developers access to the sensors available on the band, as well as the ability to create tiles. Enhance and extend the experience of your applications to your customers' wrists. More at http://developer.microsoftband.com/.
releaseNotes:
Provides real-time access to sensor data from one or more Microsoft Bands.
Allows creating Tiles on Microsoft Band, and sending notifications to them.
Allows creating rich content for Tiles, via custom UI pages that can include Text, Icon, Button and Barcode elements.
Allows applications to handle Tile and Button events.
Allows Band customization by changing the color theme or wallpaper.
summary: The Microsoft Band SDK gives developers access to the sensors available on the band, as well as the ability to create tiles. Enhance and extend the experience of your applications to your customers' wrists. More at http://developer.microsoftband.com/.
title: Microsoft Band SDK
